name: cute_kittens.txt
description:
This point and click research adventure has you sitting in front of a virtual laptop. Your task is to find out, why things seem to get stranger. It surprises with witty humour and lots of detail. There is some typing, but mostly you'll be hunting down websites. Keep your eyes open for cute kittens and they might show you the way. Hunt clues and use them to progress.

This game was created for the one week community game jam by two people.
